author: Bluscream
changelog:
- Fixed FBTModeSwitchNotificationsTemplateHalfBody not properly displaying
+ Add FlightModeSwitchNotification
+ Added SeatedModeSwitchNotification
+ Added InviteNotification
description:
Simple `Mod` that allows you to send additional notifications to other players via the ChatBox mod like
- World Download Percentage
- Instance Switching
- Instance Rejoining
- Flight Mode Switching
- VR Mode Switching
- FBT Switching
- Seated Mode Switching
- Muting/Unmuting
- Voice Status
- Invite/Friend request recieved
name: MoreChatNotifications
